{
    "number": 190808,
    "data": "1,2,4,7,8,13,14,16,22,25,26,28,32,40,43,44,49,50,52,56,64,67,76,79,80,85,86,88,97,98,100,104,112,121,128,130,133,134,148,151,152,157,158,160,169,170,172,176,193,194,196,200,202,208,224,229,238,241,242,256",
    "name": "Increasing sequence generated by these rules:  a(1)=1, and if x is in a then 2x and 3x+1 are in a.",
    "comment": [
        "See A190803."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Reinhard Zumkeller, <a href=\"/A190808/b190808.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000</a>"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "h = 2; i = 0; j = 3; k = 1; f = 1; g = 9 ;",
        "a = Union[Flatten[NestList[{h # + i, j # + k} &, f, g]]]  (* A190808 *)",
        "b = a/2; c = (a - 1)/3; r = Range[1, 900];",
        "d = Intersection[b, r] (* A190851 *)",
        "e = Intersection[c, r] (* A190852 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(Haskell)",
        "import Data.Set (singleton, deleteFindMin, insert)",
        "a190808 n = a190808_list !! (n-1)",
        "a190808_list = f $ singleton 1",
        "   where f s = m : (f $ insert (2*m) $ insert (3*m+1) s')",
        "             where (m, s') = deleteFindMin s",
        "-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 01 2011"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A190803, A190851, A190852."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "1,2",
    "author": "_Clark Kimberling_, May 20 2011",
    "ext": [
        "a(55)=224 inserted by _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 01 2011"
    ],
    "references": 5,
    "revision": 10,
    "time": "2013-07-13T12:04:09-04:00",
    "created": "2011-05-25T17:59:34-04:00"
}
